snippet.title: Viking Vengeance RPG Closed Beta Gameplay Footage
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1082890/Viking_Vengeance/
Music by Danheim: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLTQVYwu-M-MnfOJDKlFnOQ
Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/vikingvengeance
Newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/1fa2c5f1a7d4/viking

Viking Vengeance is a narrative-driven rogue-lite dungeon crawler in which you use the power of the Gods to stop the Templar Oppression. Inspired by norse mythology the game takes place in an alternate history with many twists and new mechanics within a lowpoly cartoonish world.
